text: hi everyone it's pie here I just wanted
to make a quick little announcement so
at the end of this month I will be
releasing the very first hot Thai
Kitchen newsletter so here's what it is
and why you might want to sign up so
first of all let me say that this is a
monthly newsletter once a month twelve
times a year not a lot so I hate junk
mail as much as you do probably and so
I'm gonna try my very best to not be the
junk mail and the idea of the hot Thai
Kitchen newsletter is it's a recap of
everything that happens on hot Thai
Kitchen and I know that most people are
busy you're busy I'm busy we don't
always have time to check different
social media YouTube website that we're
interested in so this is sort of my way
to package everything that happens into
one neat newsletter so you can get
yourself caught up even if you haven't
been able to keep up in the past month
so what's gonna be in it is all the
videos that I posted this month
obviously and then any announcements
such as the updates on my upcoming
cookbook or if I'm gonna be going
anywhere any events I'm participating in
and the most exciting feature of all is
I'm gonna be including some fan photos
so I get pictures all the time of people
cooking my recipes and they look awesome
and I've always wanted a way to share
them with you so I'm going to be making
a collage of the month's photos and
sharing them with you and I do I think
it's a great way for you to inspire the
people to cook Thai food and if you
yourself need inspiration it's a really
good way to sort of oh look that person
made this and this person made that it's
it's really doable and so I'm really
excited about that so if you want to
read more about this newsletter I will
put the link to the web to my website of
more with more information the link is
down below in the description and that's
also where you can sign up so you can go
ahead and do that and oh if you're
wondering where I am
I am at my friend Hanna's place we are
about to have a Thai Japanese fusion
party and she's holding camera so I'm
gonna switch it
get to meet her a little bit business
Hana you might recognize her from the
oneworld kitchen she's of Japanese cook
there and she will be of buying some
Thai dishes so I'm super excited about
that
and I'll share some photos on social
media I'll see you next time all right
